section.p: As a marketplace owner, you are responsible for one or more marketplaces. This involves the followings tasks:

ul.li: Defining who is allowed to access your marketplace.
Defining the suppliers, brokers, and resellers who are allowed to publish services to your marketplace.
Administrating your marketplace, for example, managing categories or enabling specific features and settings.
Customizing your marketplace to adapt it to your organization's standards, for example, adapting the texts presented to customers on the marketplace.
Collecting your share of the revenue for the services offered by suppliers, brokers, and resellers on your marketplace.
